trans-unit.source: Represents a scaled view of the chart.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView"></xref> class.
Gets a flag that indicates whether the axis is zoomed in.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the axis is zoomed in; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the minimum size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView"></xref> object.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> that represents the minimum size of the scale view.
Gets or sets the unit of measurement of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.MinSize*> property.

A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.MinSize*> property.
Gets or sets the position of the scale view.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> that represents the position of the scale view.
Scrolls to a position along an axis specified by the newPosition parameter, which is expressed as a value.
The new position to scroll.
Scrolls to a position along an axis specified by the newPosition parameter.
The new position to scroll.
Scrolls along an axis according to the direction and size indicated by the scrollType parameter.
The direction and size to scroll.
Gets or sets the size of the scale view.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> that represents the size of the scale view.
Gets or sets the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size*> property.

A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size*> property.
Gets or sets the minimum small scrolling size.
Used only if the small scrolling size is not set.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> that represents the small scrolling size.
Gets or sets the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*> property.

A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*> property.
Gets or sets the small scrolling size.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the small scrolling size.
Gets or sets the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*> property.

A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*> property.
Gets the maximum axis value of a data view.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> that represents the maximum axis value for the data view.
Gets the minimum axis value of a data view.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> that represents the minimum axis value for the data view.
Sets a new axis data view and/or position based on the specified start and end values.
The new start position for the axis scale view.
The new end position for the axis scale view.
Sets a new axis data view and/or position based on the specified start position, view size and unit of measurement.
The new start position for the axis scale view.
The new size for the axis scale view.
The new unit of measurement of the size.
Sets a new axis data view and/or position based on the specified start position, view size, unit of measurement and save state.
The new start position for the axis scale view.
The new size for the axis scale view.
The new unit of measurement of the size.
Indicates whether the current size and/or position must be saved.
Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the zooming user interface is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the zooming user interface is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Resets one zoom operation by restoring the axis data view.
Resets the specified number of zoom operations by restoring the axis data view.
Set the `numberOfViews` parameter to zero (0) to reset all zoom operations.
Number of zoom operations to reset.
